articles.content: IKEA isn't going to be making a play for top tech company anytime soon, but it has kept up an offering of solid smart home devices. Its latest releases are a trio of affordable smart home sensors for… [+1885 chars]

articles.author: William Gallagher
articles.title: Take a first look at Vision Pro's 3D virtual 'Yosemite Environment' - AppleInsider
articles.description: Apple Vision Pros 3D wallpaper has now been shown off by a developer, revealing how the headset can present apps and controls as if floating in a 3D environment like a wintry Yosemite.
